channel.title: Confused :\
channel.description:
I have a problem with a custom item, its one that came with the source.
Basically its a cape thats going in the weapon slot how would I change this so I can equip it to the correct place?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Confused :\
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Find that item ID, and make sure it’s correct, next open up Item.java, since it’s a cape look for

public static int capes[] = {

Next, add the cape item ID so it fits in with all the other IDs, save and compile and try it again.

Read full topic
